titleStmt.title: The papists bait or their usual method in gaining proselites answered by Charles Gataker ... ; to which is added, a letter of the Lord Viscount Falkland to the same gentleman, much to this present purpose.
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Charles, 1614 or 15-1680.
Falkland, Lucius Cary, Viscount, 1610?-1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. for Hen. Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
